content.question: Which of the following is an outcome of the authorâ€™s argument in the passage?

choices.label: Nigerian health care programs provide equal access to all citizens.
There is greater economic diversification in Nigeria.
Governmental corruption has persisted in Nigeria.

content.answer: Governmental corruption has persisted in Nigeria.

unit.text: 5: Political and Economic Changes and Development

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Explain how the implications of the author's argument or perspective may affect political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
